Item ID1933

Flour is an ingredient that is used mainly in the Cooking skill. It can be used to produce several types of dough when combined with water.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Usage
  • 4 Spawn
  • 5 Quest usage
  • 6 Item sources
    • 6.1 Shop locations
  • 7 Changes

Creation[edit | edit source]

Only one grain can be processed at a time, but the flour bin can store up to 30 flour before it needs to be emptied. Flour can be collected at any windmill except in Zanaris and on Harmony Island.

Requirements
Members
TicksVaries[r 1]
ToolsNoneFacilities Windmill
Materials
ItemQuantityCost
Grain117
Pot15
Total Cost22
Pot of flour196
Profit74
  1. ↑ Flour is manually collected from the basin
Steps
1. Put grain into the hopper at the top of a windmill
2. Activate the hopper controls
3. Use a pot on the flour bin on the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] to collect a pot of flour

Usage[edit | edit source]

Flour, by itself, is not used in cooking. Rather, flour can be turned into dough by mixing a container of water with a pot of flour. There are multiple types of dough that can be created: bread dough, pastry dough, pizza dough, and pitta dough, each with its own respective food(s) that can be cooked from it.

Spawn[edit | edit source]

An empty pot spawns in the Cooks' Guild which contains a mill, though the guild requires 32 Cooking and a chef's hat for entry.

Pots of flour can be obtained for free by searching an oak larder (or a higher tier larder) in a player-owned house. For members, this is significantly faster than creating flour from grain.

Quest usage[edit | edit source]

After starting the quest Murder Mystery, players can obtain as much flour as they require by using a pot with the cook's barrel of flour. As this is right by a sink and range, it is an excellent spot for turning swamp tar into swamp paste.

Players with access to a skills necklace may find the barrel of flour upstairs in the farm in Getting Ahead to be an even faster way to obtain infinite flour, as it is closer to a teleport.

It is one of the three required items for Cook's Assistant.

It is also needed for Prince Ali Rescue and Getting Ahead.

It could also be one of the required items on the list for Mourning's End Part II

It is needed for Freeing the Mountain Dwarf in Recipe for Disaster.

It can be used to produce several types of dough when combined with [[water]]. ==Creation== Only one grain can be processed at a time, but the [[flour bin]] can store up to 30 flour before it needs to be emptied. Flour can be collected at any [[windmill]] except in [[Zanaris]] and on [[Harmony Island]]. {{Recipe |members = No |ticks = Varies |ticksnote = Flour is manually collected from the basin |facilities = Windmill |mat1 = Grain |mat2 = Pot |output1 = Pot of flour }} {{Instructions |step1 = Put [[grain]] into the [[hopper]] at the top of a [[windmill]] |step2 = Activate the [[hopper controls]] |step3 = Use a [[pot]] on the [[flour bin]] on the {{FloorNumber|uk=0}} to collect a [[pot of flour]] }} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Pot of flour}} ==Usage== Flour, by itself, is not used in cooking. Rather, flour can be turned into dough by mixing a container of water with a pot of flour. There are multiple types of dough that can be created: [[bread dough]], [[pastry dough]], [[pizza base|pizza dough]], and [[pitta dough]], each with its own respective food(s) that can be cooked from it. ==Spawn== An empty pot spawns in the [[Cooks' Guild]] which contains a mill, though the guild requires 32 Cooking and a [[chef's hat]] for entry. Pots of flour can be obtained for free by searching an [[oak larder]] (or a higher tier larder) in a [[player-owned house]]. For members, this is significantly faster than creating flour from grain. ==Quest usage== After starting the quest [[Murder Mystery]], players can obtain as much flour as they require by using a pot with the cook's [[Barrel of flour (Sinclair Mansion)|barrel of flour]]. As this is right by a sink and [[range]], it is an excellent spot for turning [[swamp tar]] into [[swamp paste]]. Players with access to a skills necklace may find the barrel of flour upstairs in the farm in [[Getting Ahead]] to be an even faster way to obtain infinite flour, as it is closer to a teleport. It is one of the three required items for [[Cook's Assistant]]. It is also needed for [[Prince Ali Rescue]] and [[Getting Ahead]]. It could also be one of the required items on the list for [[Mourning's End Part II]] It is needed for [[Recipe for Disaster/Freeing the Mountain Dwarf|Freeing the Mountain Dwarf]] in [[Recipe for Disaster]]. ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Pot of flour}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Pot of flour}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |daterange = 26 January –
